A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is part of my blood and I bet that in a few years\, this film will be remembered as fondly as Empire. Sure\, there are some clunky lines of dialog\, but it's Star Wars. That happens. Sure\, there's an unneccessary plotline film-wise\, but internally it's a logical one. Above all of this\, I just loved it.
